Reviews.Title: phone is junk
Reviews.Author: sharon moen
Reviews.Content: does not pick any bars cant even talk outside try to get a replacement they sent me one back is craked

Reviews.Title: Buy if you want a basic phone
Reviews.Author: jennifer vallian
Reviews.Content: I hated the phone it horrible it cheap and very slow no wifi but I can deal with it does work with family mobile if the service is good

Reviews.Title: Total piece of junk
Reviews.Author: peter mazurko
Reviews.Content: This is suppose to work on all GSM networks......but it doesn't. The phone works on my T Mobile but the internet is not working. It will not work on AT&T; or Family mobile. Cheap screen.  If all you want is it for a phone, buy something else.

Reviews.Title: ALEX
Reviews.Author: Alexandria
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE. IT IS HORRIBLE!!!! THE SIGNAL SUCKS UNLESS YOU'RE STANDING IN A SPECIFIC SPOT, THE BACK PIECE CRACKS IF YOU TRY TO TAKE IT OFF, THE PHONE DOESN'T HAVE WIFI, THE WEB DOESN'T WORK AT ALL AND ON TOP OF THAT THE CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS. I HAD TO THREATEN TO SEND IT BACK FOR THEM TO RESPOND TO MY EMAIL. HORRIBLE COMPANY AND HORRIBLE PHONE.

Reviews.Title: Could not make a call
Reviews.Author: Edgar Perez
Reviews.Content: I got 2 of these phones one for me and other as a gift and when i went to the Dominican Republic and inserted a sine card I could not download Whatsapp, and when I made a call I could not hear anything but static on either my side and the called side.  It is a very disappointment.Both phones worked the same way. I would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: DonT  Not Buy
Reviews.Author: Naomi
Reviews.Content: worst waste of money you would ever waste. do yourself a favor and do not but this cheap piece of crap. absolutely nothing works and i mean NOTHING. THIS CELL PHONE WAS SOO bad the seller diDNT even want it back. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY

Reviews.Title: SVP Phone
Reviews.Author: Deda Berente
Reviews.Content: This is a cheap phone. The back is so thin that it will break when you try to open it to install a battery or a sim card. The SD does not work, it slips in but does not register. The touch screen works only sometimes. The camera does work well when you can get it to work. The phone freezes up and you have to restart it to get it to work again. I do not recommend this to anyone.This is the second one I have gotten. The first on was sent back and I bought another one. Both were cheap and do not work.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone all arount...
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to get the unlock status of it and when it arrived it would not power on. I got it to power on once, but after that it would not stay on unless on the charger with the back cover removed, once I put the cover on it would shut off every time. Truthfully I would not recommend this phone, but the cust service was prompt and they offered everything they could even when I requested my money back they got me a shipping label right away.

Reviews.Title: stupid phone
Reviews.Author: shaq
Reviews.Content: to be honest the phone is really that stupid i 100% regent i even bough the phone .i am being 100% honest. i would not let anybody even think of buying this phone.what is a  phone without wifi ?
